mapper.select: -- 员工信息查询api SELECT he.first_name, last_name, email, sex, phone_num, hd.department_code, hd.department_name, concat( hl.province, hl.city, hl.address ) detail_address, hj.job_name FROM hand_jobs hj RIGHT JOIN hand_employees he on hj.employee_id=he.employee_id LEFT JOIN hand_departments hd on he.department_id=hd.department_id LEFT JOIN hand_locations hl on hd.location_id=hl.location_id WHERE first_name like concat('%',#{firstName},'%') or last_name like concat('%',#{firstName},'%')
mapper.update: update hand_employees set status_code=#{statusCode} ,sex=#{sex} where employee_id=#{employeeId}
